# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessory/updateName(_:completionHandler:)] method to change the name to a value chosen by the user.

## Identifying an Accessory

- **updateName(_:completionHandler:)**: Changes the name of the accessory.
- **uniqueIdentifier**: A unique identifier for the accessory.
- **identifier**: A unique identifier for the accessory.
